Pilot Time was designed by pilots to make a few common aviation tasks fast and easy.

The Time Page instantly gives you the current time in 12 hour, 24 hour and UTC formats for your chosen time zone.

The Converter Page allows you to quickly convert any past, current or future time to/from UTC or any other time zone.

Tips on using the Time Page:

  • Tap on the time zone to change it.
  • Tap on "Converter" at bottom right to go to Converter screen.

Tips on using the Converter Page:

  • Tap on the time zone under "Base" or "Result" to change the time zone. There is a "UTC" button at the top right of this page - tap it to select UTC time quickly.
  • Tap the date/time area under the "Base" column to select a past, current, or future date/time to convert from.
  • Tap the yellow "Switch" button to toggle the Base and Result columns.
  • Tap on "Time" at bottom left to go to Time screen.
